name: Vishal Sharma
description: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.

name: Leanne Graham
description: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code

name: Priyanka
description: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes

name: Test test
description: In order to be irreplaceable, one must always be different

name: test 2
description: Sometimes it pays to stay in bed on Monday, rather than spending the rest of the week debugging Monday’s code

name: test 4
description: Perfection is achieved not when there is nothing more to add, but rather when there is nothing more to take away.

name: Leanne Graham
description: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad.”

name: Leanne Graham
description: Fix the cause, not the symptom

name: Leanne Graham
description: Optimism is an occupational hazard of programming: feedback is the treatment.

name: Leanne Graham
description: When to use iterative development? You should use iterative development only on projects that you want to succeed.
